name: Code Precision
description:
Located in Tel Aviv, the #2 Tech Capital of the World, Code Precision creates powerful, personalized software solutions for businesses of all sizes and specialties.
For us, it's not about meeting a set of fixed requirements. It's about building elegant, flawless code that not only runs like clockwork, but also captures your vision of the perfect software in both form and function.
Code Precision solutions aren't just written. They're crafted and engineered for precise performance, with a passion for perfection that is unequaled in the software industry.
Innovative technology with a personal touch
Our team of experienced software engineers produces clean, elegant code that meets all specifications and does exactly what it's supposed to. Our interfaces leverage the latest technology while accommodating our clients' individual goals and working styles.
When building software, we focus on these core areas:
Quality. Our software solutions are stable, reliable, and efficient, saving you time and money.
Timeliness. We understand the importance of meeting deadlines. When you contract with us on a project, we'll commit the necessary resources to meet - or beat - your timeline.
Technology. Our expertise in multiple areas, combined with state-of-the-art tools and methodologies, produces resilient solutions that mesh seamlessly with your business, accommodate growth, and work with the newest platforms and interfaces
Communication. We feel that it's essential to keep you informed, every step of the way. We ensure full transparency and a high level of communication on your developing project.
We're excited to work on your project!  Visit CodePrecision.com or email hello(at)codeprecision.com directly.
